channel.title: FRB: Chair Yellen: Speeches and Testimony
channel.description: Speeches and Testimony of Chair Janet L. Yellen

item.title: Yellen, Semiannual Monetary Policy Report to the Congress
item.description: Testimony before the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs, U.S. Senate, Washington, District of Columbia. Chair Yellen submitted identical remarks to the Committee on Financial Services, U.S. House of Representatives, on June 22, 2016.
item.dcterms:audience: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs, U.S. Senate
